info.title: Web Core Project
info.description: It is the web core project class. Manages web core publishing and packaging for distribution.

const.name: PROJECT_TYPE
const.description: The web core project type id.

prop.name: vcs
prop.description: The vcs manager object for the project.

method.name: publish
method.description:
Publish the entire web core project.
Publish web sdk. Create distribution packages. Publish all resources.

parameter.name: $releaseVersion
parameter.description: The release version of the project.

parameter.name: $branchName
parameter.description: The source branch name to publish.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: createPackages
method.description: Create all distribution packages for the web core.

parameter.name: $releaseVersion
parameter.description: The release version of the packages.

parameter.name: $branchName
parameter.description: The source branch name to get the files from.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.
